website_summaries.verdict: This Mehron Holographic Silver Glitter Dust is a cosmetic-grade polyester glitter that is perfect for making your body sparkle.
pros: Use it on your hair, face, or body for a shimmering effect
Comes with mini mixing liquid to create a metallic opaque color
cons: Some say it doesn't appear holographic
it's more of a fine silver glitter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but less product.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glitter, but came with significantly less glitter than another glitter I have by Mehron. See photo attached of brand new gold glitter next to a brand new white glitter I bought a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Just love it!
customer_reviews.text: By turning it upside down and right side up, I put the makeup brush on the lid and then onto my pressed powder and there is just enough to give my face a sparkle without overdoing it. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Way Things Are

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews first and decided to buy it anyway, even if its just the dust...the cheerleaders love it! I used a q-tip and dipped it in water or used hand sanitizer to apply it to the face. A little goes a long way and even when the football season is over this still can be used to apply with other makeup or gloss. So it was worth the buy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BetheOne

customer_reviews.title: incorporating this product with some Adele adhesive glue worked perfectly and lasted all night I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a drag queen makeup I was doing for a client on Halloween. incorporating this product with some Adele adhesive glue worked perfectly and lasted all night I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: I love this glitter!
customer_reviews.text: Right now I’m using it with my Argan Oil and some fragrance oil. I mix it up and rub on my skin for moisture, scent and of course this amazing glitter! It’s very fine so it’s a nice subtle shimmer that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Koni

customer_reviews.title: Tiny tub of glitter dust
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a bigger tub of glitter. Using for glitter beard and might need more. lol
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best loose glitter available
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is one of my favorites! The color is perfect and it sparkles gorgeously. I can use the glitter for so many things and I love how fine it is! I'd absolutely love to order more colors when I have the money. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Super Holo Glitter
customer_reviews.text: THIs pot is SUPER small, but a little glitter goes a long way. This is definitely holographic glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this glitter it’s as small as dust just what I wanted to give my eye makeup a touch of sparkle
customer_reviews.author: rosy

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Glitter-rific!
customer_reviews.text: I love this holographic rainbow glitter. It looks so pretty when under light and definitely in the sun! I love to mix it in with my lipgloss or nail polish. But the jar is a little bit more tiny than I thought. I wish it was more bigger. It looks bigger in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used this in a face painting booth and it was great. We mixed a little glitter with hand cleanser (the kind you don't use water). Made it easy as pie to apply with a Q tip just where we needed it.
customer_reviews.author: In the Boonies

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny and cute but the glitter is not a good one to use for makeup or lipgloss it doesn’t stick and the sparkles are a little too big for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bit to big for what i wanted it for. Ill find another use for it. Still recommend
customer_reviews.author: J_Lynn_119

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The Sparkle is not too overwhelming, it's perfectly mild. And it's a very fine glitter so it's easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this glitter powder. I love the brand Mehron. I've used the products awhile now for Halloween and Co-splay.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I was going to a sequins party and decided to be super extra. This was the perfect product to cover my entire body with!
customer_reviews.author: Maxsom

customer_reviews.title: worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to add a gold sparkle to my homemade soaps...worked like a charm...
customer_reviews.author: christine Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought to dust shoulders for prom (color matched dress) and worked well. Also used in hair.
customer_reviews.author: N&D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a fashion show makeup and was amazing!!! I applied it on my face after the makeup and with the lights on the catwalk I had a brilliant glow. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a highlighter and it's so cute with the holographic reflection
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Super Fine Glitter Great for Makeup Application
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for makeup application. Really fine glitter that works great for a glitter highlighter. Stays on with just a bit of vaseline. Very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Looks so beautiful on my Inglot 988
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product so I can do a little sparkly hombre on my nails with the most beautiful INGLOT 988 nail polish (the most amazing blue green color there is!). I used the glitter dust for some sprinkled shine on my ring fingers (both hands), then painted over with top coat. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: A_Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: NEVER HAS THIS EVER BEEN HOLO
customer_reviews.text: I'm ticked off the glitter I waited almost 2 weeks for is not holo at all. I planned it perfectly to arrive just when I needed my infill, I was going to have the perfect holo nails ever and now I am forced to find another design and not use this glitter at all! I am very disappointed. I was expecting it to be a small container but not just plain sliver glitter. It looks nothing like the picture ever!
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: High quality loose glitter
customer_reviews.text: Good loose glitter, does not stick on its own, but sticks well to wet face paint. Good amount for price.
customer_reviews.author: PieAndPoirot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and just as expected. Used for lip gloss making
customer_reviews.author: sassifemini

customer_reviews.title: Nice eye glitter
customer_reviews.text: Used the glitter for makeup for a costume party Nice qualty. Use a primer before putting on the makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: It is so awesomely great. U cannot find face glitter in stores
customer_reviews.text: It is so awesomely great. U cannot find face glitter in stores. I would like to order this exact order but in different colos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bling
customer_reviews.text: Yummy. Worked perfect for my project and is definitely holographic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my GF and she loved it! She literally screamed and hugged me for 10 minutes straight. Saying "thank you thank thank you." So thank youuuu for making something that would give me so much happiness for giving her so much happiness.
customer_reviews.author: Dabknight

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. The kids like it!
customer_reviews.text: I apply the product with my finger to my face painting works. Think I will try using a small fluffy brush. but not sure if that will smear the paint. Anyway, I do like the effect and the children I paint love the effect, too!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty! Used for my alien costume and it loved it
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Glitter was the exact kind of shimmer I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Glitter was the exact kind of shimmer I was looking for and worth the money for how far a little goes!
customer_reviews.author: karenlampreda

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work very well.I don't really like the smell
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deyo

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The sparkles are sheer and lightweight you can apply them anywhere
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful & very fine so looks great on the skin. Love the prismatic effect of it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela & Mateo IbarraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Overall good! The size is a bit small and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall good!The size is a bit small and it's hard to get the dust to stick, but it adds a nice shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: It was great
customer_reviews.text: It went well with the lip glosses I created, I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Colindres

customer_reviews.title: Fun Glitter!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. The glitter went on well and lasted the entire night. Everyone really loved the holographic silver. I was worried that it would just be silver but it really did have the holographic look.
customer_reviews.author: V. W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for nail art and it is simply wonderful product. Easy to use and the cost is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: A_Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun Glitter Dust. Will use often. Product arrived in good condition and promptly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: the glitter is pretty & looks great, especially for being so inexpensive! i mix a little with my highlighter & apply it with a q tip-- it sometimes clumps together a bit but that's easily remedied. stays on all day & is very eye-catching!
customer_reviews.author: ryan rosaceae

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the colors don't show up very well on darker skin. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Gina Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I expected straight silver but the sparkles have a bit of a rainbow glimmer to them. Very fine dust, which is hard to find! I like to mix in a bit of lotion before applying it, to make it stick! I purchased this in gold as well and I am so glad I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding a little bling
customer_reviews.text: Seller was quick to send!! Perfect for adding a little bling!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fine glitter, perfect for face/body. Does not irritate skin.
customer_reviews.author: Outside the Box

customer_reviews.title: Where is the gold ?
customer_reviews.text: Applied several times but wouldn't get to a point that it could be seen
customer_reviews.author: Tara Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice if you want a plain silver. Very shimmery, but it is not holographic at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great loose glitter! Used during my body painting and it turned out awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Eskridge

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted and fantastic customer service. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: anne larsen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful on a light pink nails
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the cost is affordable.Looks amazing on light pink nails. I am a big fan of understated hence I use this on the wedding ring fingers only but a tiny bit on all of them?! Delish!
customer_reviews.author: A_Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: And it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I read someone saying it is not holographic, well maybe they received the wrong one, because mine is! And it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is good if you want the glitter concentrated in one area
customer_reviews.text: This is good if you want the glitter concentrated in one area. I bought it for my face, where I wanted it to spread out and be subtle. It just sits in one area no matter what I do. This would be better for nails.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! The glitter is fine and loose. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST glitter dust!!! I'll be buying more of this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Very small container. I thought it would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small container. I thought it would be a decent size from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: dmv

customer_reviews.title: Very fine glitter.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and consistency of this glitter because the coverage was just right when I sprinkled it in my nieces hair for a costume. I was very satisfied with the amount of sparkle it added to her hair without feeling like I used too much of the product to achieve the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: KeeKe

customer_reviews.title: Tiny container
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet, or even opened the packaging but this is a much smaller container than pictures make it appear. I wouldn't have purchased it had I known but I'll still give it a try and update after I do. Just wanted to post pictures to help others see the actual size.
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: OK, not exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I used to be able to buy a "dusting sparkling product for the face". Just to give it that touch of sparkle. This is a little THICK...and is probably not intended for that use. This product put some really thick sparkles on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used this in a face painting booth and it was great. We mixed a little glitter with hand cleanser (the kind you don't use water). Made it easy as pie to apply with a Q tip just where we needed it.
customer_reviews.author: In the Boonies

customer_reviews.title: Just a hint of sparkle
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure you can use glue and place full on spots of glitter with this, but just dusting on give a really nice rainbow sparkle. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BooYaa

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tiny sparkles! Use as much or as little as you want. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Time to sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Very fine and works well with primer and sprinkled in your hair for a little extra sparkle
customer_reviews.author: Angie C

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Package was opened, but I am sure my little vousin will love it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and shiny... oooooohhh!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for face painting during a fundraiser for my daughter's choir. The kids LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: jazzybess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO shimmery! We use this to add that extra bling when doing face paint.
customer_reviews.author: Jhm

customer_reviews.title: The glitter was a fine dust. It was a perfect for a shimmering ...
customer_reviews.text: The glitter was a fine dust. It was a perfect for a shimmering Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodstuff
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is the stuff of dreams. Perfect holo. Quick ship, great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Zillah

customer_reviews.title: Ultra-fine particles and iridescent like I was expecting from the description
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this glitter. Ultra-fine particles and iridescent like I was expecting from the description... works well for my stage performances.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for my product, great transaction, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Marian K. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was bigger for the price but its very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Justbehappy

customer_reviews.title: great value for the
customer_reviews.text: worked well with Santa make up kit - is what as expected, great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kanaka - Orlando, FL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fades quickly after application but looks nice for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to see it that's my only complaint its very pretty but for the price seems like u don't get ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to use so much just to actually be able to see it that's my only complaint its very pretty but for the price seems like u don't get very much of it
customer_reviews.author: Angela wall

customer_reviews.title: Glitterific!
customer_reviews.text: I love this GlitterDust! It is a silver color in the jar, however it reflects lights well for a holographic effect. Although the jar is small, a little goes a long ways (as glitter usually does). I would suggest applying after using lotion or primer, since it does not stick well on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Not Holographic Glitter
customer_reviews.text: I went online to find holographic glitter and saw this and it looked very good, so I bought it. I just got it today, and I opened it to find that it is not holographic glitter. It is a very pretty silver, but if you are looking for holographic glitter, DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rector

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Already put on my nails and looks great! Picture does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: yingy

customer_reviews.title: I got this item for halloween and it didn't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for halloween and it didn't stay on at all, It was just fall off. I have used Glitter dust in the past and this product doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Holographic, But Nice Silver Glitter
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a holographic glitter but it's really just a fine silver glitter, in no light is it holographic. I was pretty bummed at that, but it's still really nice super fine glitter. I am using it for crafts but just getting some on my hands I could see it wasn't gritty like most glitters, would be really good for cosmetic use.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's too fine to be good for face painting. It's a very pretty, but too subtle for children's face paint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible "cosmetic" glitter. Ok for halloween maybe. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a silver but misleading in the description when you want holographic glitter
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty glitter but it's very misleading as to what it is. Don't get me wrong I love glitter like this! But I was looking for true Holigraphic glitter and it has been a bear trying to find it anywhere. So when you are looking for that in particular this isn't it. But it really is a pretty silver glitter. It's just not a true Holigraphic glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Meleasa Robinson

product_meta.title: Mehron Makeup GlitterDust (.25 oz) (Holographic Silver)
feature_bullets: Apply onto damp paint, cream makeup or a moist fingertip or brush for longevity
For use on body, face, and hair
Proudly Made in the USA since 1927
